channel.title: Skill cape emote [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey, i have now skill cape emotes on my delta server... The gfx are right.... but when i do a skill cape emote the gfx works but not the animation.... my character is still stading on the ground and doesn't move...
so can any body help me with the right animations?
Hello........ Does anybody has the right animations?
